Title: Query all records from feature layer
Steps: Open layer/query interface and run query without filter

Title: Query with valid WHERE filter
Steps: Run query with valid filter (e.g. status='Active')

Title: Query with filter that returns zero rows
Steps: Run query with filter that has no matches
Expected_Result: Request succeeds and returns empty result set

Title: Query with invalid field name
Steps: Run query using non-existing field in filter
Expected_Result: Validation error returned with clear message

Title: Query with max record count boundary
Steps: Run query at max limit and next page/offset

Title: Query with valid geometry envelope
Steps: Run spatial query with valid extent
Expected_Result: Only features in extent are returned

Title: Query without auth token on secured layer
Add feature with valid required fields
Preconditions: Editing enabled and required fields known
Steps: Submit add feature request with valid attributes
Expected_Result: Feature is created and object ID returned

Title: Add feature missing required field
Steps: Submit add request without required attribute
Expected_Result: Validation error returned and feature not created

Title: Add feature with invalid data type
Steps: Submit add with string in numeric field

Title: Add feature with null in nullable field
Steps: Submit add with null in nullable field

Title: Update existing feature with valid data
Update with invalid field value length
Delete non-existing feature by ID
Expected_Result: Operation returns failure for invalid ID

Title: Viewer cannot edit when edit disabled
Steps: Login as viewer and attempt edit

Title: Editor can add/update/delete
Steps: Login as editor and perform add/update/delete

Title: New field visibility after schema update
Expected_Result: New field appears and is queryable

Title: Service unavailable handling
Expected_Result: Clear service error returned without crash

Title: Verify data persists after update
Expected_Result: Returned values match last successful update

Title: Add attachment to feature
Steps: Upload valid attachment to existing feature
Expected_Result: Attachment stored and linked to feature

Title: Partial failure handling in batch edit
Steps: Submit mixed valid/invalid edits in one batch
